text: Esia 16.19 HJL 18.2-3, 18.18, 18.26, Lom 16.5, 2 Ti 1.15 fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavalɨ agɨlaŋ nalusaŋ lamulavi uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨci Akuila tamaŋ dɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ hɨniavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ uami. Aludɨ Hekɨlɨ dɨ ibi hɨvɨ nalusaŋ hekɨlɨ sɨbaŋ lamulavi uami. Akuila tamaŋ nalusaŋ lamulavi uami. Akuila abinu dɨ ibi Pɨlisila uami.
